title: betnomi
author: betnomi
created_time: September 27, 2022, 03:06:57 PMLast edit: September 27, 2022, 07:49:26 PM by betnomi
content: QuoteGuys, I have some sealed cold custom wallets, one of which will be raffled off in this thread! I have very little experience in conducting such raffles, but I will try to make everything go as smoothly as possible! I hope I haven't missed anything and wish you good luck!Free shipping (I can ship to MinerJones and you pay him for handling and reshipping).I will announce the block number when we are full.How this will work:Select a slot on a first-come, first-served basis. I will choose a block whose last symbol of the hash will determine the winner.0 -  Thiago0071 -  heisty 2 -  GazetaBitcoin3 -  sam004 -  bitcoiner24h5 -  5tift6 -  Suzuki Matt7 -  QuakerBull8 -  haloxon9 -  PM-ICTa -  YodasRedRocketb -  MoparMiningLLCc -  MrMojoRising26d -  mole0815e -  owlcatzf -   JanEmil

comments.author: sam00
comments.body: 3 - sam00Thank you very much for the free raffle!edit after saving myself a spot:How were these wallets produced @betnomi ?Did you have them made through the official Ledger Co-Branding Partnership Program, which I am assuming?https://www.ledger.com/co-branded-partnership
